column4: [ SpudDogg] : well it tells me to setup access directly to root (which im not pleased with) and i typically have 1 user set up (which is my accnt) but other than that there are no other users unless i start setting up web hosting accounts, i havent gotten that far yet but my goal is to set up a web hosting server.
SpudDogg, those howtoforge "perfect setups" are chocked full of bad information.  Don't use them.
